author: to hit
glottocode: Was previously marked as set 8 (eg POc [tuki]). The [t] and [k] line up correctly (at least with Basai:Pawley's POc), but distribution + reduplicated Basai form makes the connection seem less plausible to me. -EG

author: salt
glottocode: Originally marked as 20, would require [-k] deletion. -EG
